title: Mini-Ep 257: (Taylor’s Version)
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 257: (Taylor’s Version)
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree give you all permission to take a bath and answer listener questions about Taylor Swift’s red lipstick, books with more sex, and bathbombs. Plus, a caller offers words of support to the listener who felt they were spiraling. - To leav...
description:
Kate and Doree give you all permission to take a bath and answer listener questions about Taylor Swift’s red lipstick, books with more sex, and bathbombs. Plus, a caller offers words of support to the listener who felt they were spiraling.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
